citation_details.title: Simulation of Neural Responses to Classical Music Using Organoid Intelligence Methods
citation_details.author: D Szelogowski
citation_details.abstract: Music is a complex auditory stimulus capable of eliciting significant changes in brain activity,  influencing cognitive processes such as memory, attention, and emotional regulation.
